message.content:
I need to identify the line item that represents the systematic allocation of the depreciable amount of an asset over its useful life, which is depreciation.

Looking at the income statement provided, I can see that there's a specific line item labeled "Depreciation" with a value of 45749.30 on 2024-01-28.

Depreciation is the accounting method that allocates the cost of a tangible or physical asset over its useful life. It represents how much of an asset's value has been used up over time.

Therefore, the value of the accumulated systematic allocation of the depreciable amount of an asset over its useful life is 45749.30.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '45749.30'}}
```
